channel.title: sitespeed.io release feed
channel.description: Follow new releases of sitespeed.io tools
channel.copyright: All rights reserved 2021, Peter Hedenskog and team

item.title: sitespeed.io 22.0.0
item.description: Build Docker containers for both amd64 and arm64 to make containers work on Mac M1. The arm container contains Firefox and Chromium. Thank you whichfinder and Radu Micu for the help! Fixed in PR #3554. When plugins is loaded, there's a new extra last step where we try to load the plugin as a globally installed npm module #3546. Fix so that we do not display the same 3rd party cookie multiple times #3545. Updated Coach Core that includes the latest version of third party web and PageXray that find more fonts without mime type. If you use the Lightouse plugin there's breaking changes: I been looking for a maintainer of the Lighthouse plugin for +1 year and I haven't found one. For me to be able to maintain it I want the plugin to be as simple as possible. I deeply regret merging the PR for adding multiple runs for Lighthouse. That PR goes against everything I know about measuring performance. Lighthouse is not built for getting correct performance metrics, it's built to help (Chrome) developers to get insights how they make the page "faster". Lets stick to the basics and keep it possible to get those recommendations from Lighthouse. Maybe someday Lighthouse will have support for user journeys, lets wait until that is officially supported and then I can check if it could be used in the plugin. By configuration JSON file. --lighthouse.config config.js By Lightouse flags file. --lighthouse.flags flag.json

item.title: browsertime 14.20.0
item.description: Docker container for both amd64 and arm64.

item.title: coach-core 7.1.0
item.description: Upgraded to PageXray 4.0.0. Upgraded to third party web 0.13.0.

item.title: pagexray 4.4.0
item.description: Fallback if mime types aren't mapped and use file endings. At the moment we fallback for some of the font types #109.

item.title: chrome-har 0.13.0
item.description: Add _isLinkPreload on the request object if it is isLinkPreload #94.

item.title: throttle 3.1.0
item.description: Add support for setting packet loss. Add --packetLoss and set the loss in percentage.

item.title: humble 0.1.2
item.description: Updated throttle frontend to latest version where you can see throttling profiles set by using the API and with custom throttling support.

item.title: coach 7.0.0
item.description: Updated to use latest Coach core and Browertime.

item.title: compare 1.0.0
item.description: Added support for using Github gists see #34. Added support for using a config file to configure which HARs to test. Added support for copy/paste directly you HAR, configuration file or a gist URL or id. Refactor the CSS into Sass, development build process now uses BrowserSync. Service worker added for offline support. Workbox is used to achieve this. Added support for showing changes in request/responses if you compare the same page #63. New internal structure and use the new configuration object all the way.

item.title: chrome-trace 0.2.2
item.description: Catch if we can't find the first thread event. We now throws an exception (that's not optimal since we don't know what's wrong) with the info of what's wrong. We can change that later on.
